subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: At the National Baseball Hall of Fame and Museum, Cal Ripken donned the customary white gloves used to handle the artifacts and gently picked up the weather-beaten glove Lou Gehrig wore when he starred for Columbia University.
snippet: At the National Baseball Hall of Fame and Museum, Cal Ripken donned the customary white gloves used to handle the artifacts and gently picked up the weather-beaten glove Lou Gehrig wore when he starred for Columbia University.
